verbose_text: Hyperexpression of the Beta subunit of the epithelial sodium channel (ENaC) serves as an alternative murine model (termed Scnn1b +-transgenic) that closely resembles the pathologic findings found in the CF lung, including hyperabsorbtion of sodium chloride, depleted airway surface liquid volume, mucus obstruction and stasis, and airway inflammation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CF lung, including hyperabsorbtion of sodium chloride, depleted airway surface liquid volume, mucus obstruction and stasis, and airway inflammation
